name: Mr Husky
description: I'm not fat, I'm just a little...Husky. This time Mr. Husky fell in love. The love's so powerful that gravity will change. Help him send his love to Miss Husky by guiding him through the most creative levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
